item.title: Pre-Commit Git Hooks
item.description: It was a pleasant surprise recently to get an email from Michael Kennedy at Talk Python. As a previous buyer of one of the Talk Python Everything Bundle which includes a number of different Python training courses, I was eligible for the “Pro” Talk Python podcast subscription, which doesn’t included ads. Going through the backlog, I added a bunch of episodes, and the timing of Episode 282: Pre-Commit Framework was perfect.
